A sermon preached at the funeral of that truly pious and faithful minister of Jesus Christ, Mr. Nich. Thorowgood at Godelman in Surrey. / By John Buck, Minister of the Gospel. Buck, John.
[4], 20 p.
Printed for Tho. Cockerill, at the Three Legs in the Poultrey, over-against the Stocks-Market, London : 1692.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
